Sun, 19 May 2024 19:31:28 +0000 Willie Jackson (centre) with Sid Going (left) and Bill Bush, two of the greatest Māori All Blacks.
A rising star from Aotearoa: Māori graduate’s path to opera https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/a-rising-star-from-aotearoa-maori-graduates-path-to-opera/ZKVIYM2RVFAFZOT3MJMU2S3YHQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/a-rising-star-from-aotearoa-maori-graduates-path-to-opera/ZKVIYM2RVFAFZOT3MJMU2S3YHQ/ You may know Te Ohorere Williams' operatic voice from the Dawn Service in Auckland. Sun, 19 May 2024 19:11:45 +0000 Te Ohorere Williams has graduated with a Master of Music in Classical Voice Performance.
Iwi Leaders Group united against Oranga Tamariki scrapping Treaty obligations https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/iwi-leaders-group-united-against-oranga-tamariki-scrapping-treaty-obligations/627BJVR52FH65H4BE4AV4HEKFQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/iwi-leaders-group-united-against-oranga-tamariki-scrapping-treaty-obligations/627BJVR52FH65H4BE4AV4HEKFQ/ Pokere PaiwaiKaren Chhour's Amendment Bill was introduced to Parliament this week. Sun, 19 May 2024 19:04:31 +0000 The proposed repeal of Section 7AA of the Oranga Tamariki Act has caused consternation for the National Iwi Chairs Forum and the Pou Tangata Iwi Leaders Group.
Napier-Taihape Rd: Cyclone survivor, mayor say road should become state highway https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-taihape-rd-cyclone-survivor-mayor-say-road-should-become-state-highway/P445CQIBRNGKTEKLVMOX7HQMHA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/napier-taihape-rd-cyclone-survivor-mayor-say-road-should-become-state-highway/P445CQIBRNGKTEKLVMOX7HQMHA/ Gary Hamilton-Irvine'It’s confusing for people having the road under the jurisdiction of two councils.' Sun, 19 May 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Maureen Goodman and her partner George Luke were trapped on the Napier-Taihape Rd during Cyclone Gabrielle. Maureen managed to alert rescuers after walking out of the slip-ravaged road. Tragically George, who was trapped for three nights, died in hospital after being rescued. Photo / Connull Lang
